subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: General purpose players like running backs and linebackers inevitably fall in the N.F.L. draft as teams seek higher-upside specialists who can make a bigger impact on third down.
snippet: General purpose players like running backs and linebackers inevitably fall in the N.F.L. draft as teams seek higher-upside specialists who can make a bigger impact on third down.
